results.definition: a large area of land preserved in its natural state as public property
examples: there are laws that protect the wildlife in this park

results.definition: a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area
examples: they went for a walk in the park

results.definition: a facility in which ball games are played (especially baseball games)
examples: take me out to the ballpark

results.definition: a lot where cars are parked
a gear position that acts as a parking brake
examples: the put the car in park and got out

results.definition: maneuver a vehicle into a parking space

examples: park the car in the yard
park the children with the in-laws
park your bag in this locker
